text: "What Is Love" is a 1993 debut single by Trinidadian-German singer Haddaway and is taken from his debut album The Album. It topped the single charts in Austria, Belgium, Denmark, Finland, France, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Portugal, Spain and Switzerland. It went to number 2 in Germany, Sweden and the United Kingdom and number 3 in Iceland. Outside Europe, the song was a hit worldwide, went to number 11 in the United States, number 12 in Australia, number 17 in Canada and number 48 in New Zealand. == References == Category:1993 songs Category:Debut singles Category:Eurodance songs
title: What Is Love
